name: ESPY
description:
"Familiar room, yet a strange feeling, Dirty walls, stained floors and bloody a mattress "

PLEASE USE THE HEADPHONES FOR THE BEST EXPERIENCE

Play through an interesting journey of ESPY to find out what really happened in that house. Discover the secrets and truth that lie within.

Controls:

W,A,S,D to move

E to interact

F to toggle flashlight on/off

R to insert new battery

Hint: Flashlight starts when battery is low.
